headline: These Could Be 3 of the Best Stocks to Own in 2025
summary: If you're looking for excellent stocks that are also benefiting from strong tailwinds right now, Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN), SoFi Technologies (NASDAQ: SOFI), and Carnival (NYSE: CCL)(NYSE: CUK) would be great picks.  Amazon is leading innovation in artificial intelligence (AI).  Ever since it unveiled its AI technology two years ago, it has remained at the forefront of the revolution, launching a large selection of services for Amazon Web Services (AWS) clients and even developing its own graphics processing units (GPUs) to compete with Nvidia's.

headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Carnival vs. Royal Caribbean
summary: Carnival (NYSE: CCL) (NYSE: CUK) and Royal Caribbean Cruises (NYSE: RCL) claim the No. 1 and No. 2 spots, respectively, in the cruise line industry.  Both companies have benefited from record bookings this year.  Unfortunately, this success leaves investors with little clarity on which cruise line stock is in a position to deliver higher returns for its shareholders.
